/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided into multiple lanes by white lines, is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the cityscape. The buildings lining the street are mostly gray and white, their uniform color palette punctuated by occasional red and green accents. The perspective of the image is from the left side of the street, looking towards the right, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene.
